title: La Bottega Italian Gourmet
text: where quality meets tradition. La Bottega is a cozy, fun gathering spot for family and friends that showcases the gourmet tastes of Italy and more. serving long island since 2003. Founded in 2003 by Giuseppe and Marisa Ruta, La Bottega is a cozy, fun gathering spot for family and friends that showcases the gourmet tastes of Italy. We are a full-service dining venue that's small in size but features big, bold flavors. The recipe to our success is simple, we do what we love.
